OllamaUrl.Name: Ollama Server URL
OllamaUrl.Hint: The URL of your local Ollama server (e.g., http://localhost:11434)

Model.Name: AI Model
Model.Hint: Select the Ollama model to use for AI responses

EmbeddingModel.Name: Embedding Model
EmbeddingModel.Hint: Model used for generating memory embeddings (e.g., nomic-embed-text)

Temperature.Name: Temperature
Temperature.Hint: Controls randomness in AI responses (0.0-1.0). Higher = more creative

ShortTermMemorySize.Name: Short-term Memory Size
ShortTermMemorySize.Hint: Number of recent messages to keep in context (20-50 recommended)

EnableAutoNarration.Name: Enable Auto-Narration
EnableAutoNarration.Hint: Automatically narrate dice rolls and combat events

SystemPrompt.Name: System Prompt
SystemPrompt.Hint: The AI's core personality and behavior instructions

DMEnabled.Name: AI DM Enabled
DMEnabled.Hint: Toggle AI Dungeon Master functionality on/off

MemoryRetrievalCount.Name: Memory Retrieval Count
MemoryRetrievalCount.Hint: Number of relevant memories to retrieve for context

SummarizationThreshold.Name: Summarization Threshold
SummarizationThreshold.Hint: Compress memories when conversation exceeds this length

Chat.ConnectionError: Failed to connect to Ollama server. Please check your settings.
Chat.ModelNotFound: The selected model was not found. Please check Ollama configuration.
Chat.ResponseError: An error occurred while generating a response.

AI.Description: Send a message to the AI Dungeon Master

Narrate.Description: Request a scene narration from the AI
